about_the_game:
∞ About OpenDraft ∞

OpenDraft was developed with the goal of improving work-flow, and built for anyone who needed a distraction-free environment to brainstorm, write, or doodle.

Designed with simplicity and versatility in mind, it boasts an infinitely growing canvas, infinite text boxes, a customizable pencil, and multiple nature sound tracks for you to choose from and help you focus!


Whether you're drafting a story or novel, writing or sketching strategies for games, organizing your study notes, brainstorming ideas, developing a game or program, or just want relaxing background audio, OpenDraft provides you with the tools you need. It gives you the freedom and space to do it all.

Features:

∞ Infinite Canvas: Draw and write without boundaries, with space that grows as you do.

∞ Offline & Secure: Everything is stored locally on your device - work without an internet connection, and access your save files at any time! 

∞ Sketching: Customize your sketches and doodles with a customizable pencil tool!

∞ Rich Text Editing: Customize your writing with adjustable fonts using Rich Text Editing. E.g italics, bold, strike, etc.

∞ Ambient Soundtracks: Stay focused with relaxing background soundscapes while you work.

∞ Auto/Manual Save: Never lose progress - your work is automatically saved every five minutes, and you can manually save at any time.

∞ Paste Images From Clipboard: Paste any image in your clipboard onto the canvas right where your mouse is.

∞ And not much more!

Why OpenDraft?

If you want a clean and minimalist experience, you value simplicity, privacy, and creativity without the clutter, OpenDraft allows you to focus on your ideas, regardless of what you are working on.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS or Newer or Equivalent
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU with OpenGL 3.3 or Vulkan Support
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: IL2CPP Build

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina or Newer
  • Processor: Both - Intel i5 / Apple M1
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Metal-Supported GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mono Build - Signed but Not Notarized
